column1: Uchi////If you've been living under a rock
column2: perhaps you haven't heard Uchi is one of the top sushi joints in town. Or perhaps you are aware of the restaurant's well-deserved accolades and just haven't made the trip yet for fear that sushi will never be worth the pinch in your wallet. I'm here to lead you to the ultimate sushi dining experience--perfect a party of two.
